Egypt will continue its supportive role for the brotherly Sudan and its security and stability in various regional and international frameworks and forums
Egypt will continue to play its supporting role in Sudan and South Sudan in order to settle all outstanding issues between them
The bonds of fraternity and common interests and the unity of the path and destiny are the main arteries flowing in one body
The ball is now in the court of Egyptian and Sudanese businessmen. Just wait for the start
